name: Roll Down Hill
description:
In this game, you roll down from an infinitely long hill, you try to get the best score!

There are 2 modes in game:

1-Timed: You try to go as far as possible in 1 minute.

2-DeathMatch: You try to go as far as possible without bumping into any tree.

Color Palette

(Trees are generated with Poisson Disk Sampling Method)

Controls

Mode-1: Arrow Keys (left, up, right, down)

Mode-2: Arrow Keys (left, right)
